name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, media reported that Zhang Daibing, a doctor from the National University of Defense Technology and the founder and chairman of Hunan Changsha Yunzhihang Technology Co., Ltd., known as the "ceiling of drones", passed away on January 3 at the age of 47. At present, Zhang Daibing's family has issued an obituary.
It is rumored that Zhang Daibing jumped to his death after being in debt due to setbacks in entrepreneurship. The specific details of his death were not disclosed in the obituary.
Looking through Zhang Daibing's social accounts, he left very suddenly. On January 2, the day before his death, he posted 2 dynamics about high-altitude cleaning of drones. From the video, he was in good condition at this time, and there was no abnormality.
After Zhang Daibing passed away, his students also published a long article to mourn him. The article stated that a few days before his death, Zhang Daibing met with friends as usual, and contacted friends the day before his death. Everyone was shocked by the news of his death.
It is said that Zhang Daibing liked mathematics since he was a child. In 1995, he was admitted to the National University of Defense Technology with excellent grades...
fullContent:
1月4日，有媒体报道，国防科技大学博士，被称为「无人机天花板」的湖南长沙市云智航科技有限公司创始人、董事长张代兵，于1月3日离世，年仅47岁。目前，张代兵家人已对外发布讣告。
 网传张代兵因创业受挫负债后跳楼身亡，具体离世细节讣告中并未公开。
 翻看张代兵的社交账号，他离开的很突然，1月2日，去世前一天还发了2条动态，是关于无人机高空清洗的内容。从视频来看，此时他的状态还好好的，看不出任何异常。
 张代兵离世后，其学生还发布长文悼念，文中称去世前几天，张代兵还照常面见了友人，去世前一天还和朋友联系，大家对他离世的消息感到无比震惊。
 据称，张代兵自幼喜欢数学，95年以优秀的成绩考入国防科技大学。在校发明了电磁飞轮储能装置，以及无线充电装置，车载半导体制冷冰箱等等，受到奖励。之后专注导航以及制导专业上，在国防科技大获得博士学位后留校工作。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is said that he was born in the military and had the rank of colonel. The drone expert fell from a building and died at the age of 47 due to unbearable debt.
On January 4, some media reported that Zhang Daibing, a doctor from the National University of Defense Technology and the founder and chairman of Hunan Changsha Yunzhihang Technology Co., Ltd., known as the "ceiling of drones", died on January 3 at the age of 47. At present, Zhang Daibing's family has issued an obituary.
It is said that Zhang Daibing jumped to his death after being in debt due to setbacks in entrepreneurship. The specific details of his death were not disclosed in the obituary.
Looking through Zhang Daibing's social account, he left very suddenly. On January 2, the day before his death, he posted 2 dynamics about drone high-altitude cleaning. From the video, he was in good condition at this time, and there was no abnormality.
After Zhang Daibing passed away, his students also published a long article to mourn him. The article said that a few days before his death, Zhang Daibing met with friends as usual, and contacted friends the day before his death. Everyone was shocked by the news of his death...
fullContent:
传军人出身，大校军衔。无人机专家因不堪债务坠楼离世年仅47岁。
 1月4日，有媒体报道，国防科技大学博士，被称为「无人机天花板」的湖南长沙市云智航科技有限公司创始人、董事长张代兵，于1月3日离世，年仅47岁。目前，张代兵家人已对外发布讣告。
 网传张代兵因创业受挫负债后跳楼身亡，具体离世细节讣告中并未公开。
 翻看张代兵的社交账号，他离开的很突然，1月2日，去世前一天还发了2条动态，是关于无人机高空清洗的内容。从视频来看，此时他的状态还好好的，看不出任何异常。
 张代兵离世后，其学生还发布长文悼念，文中称去世前几天，张代兵还照常面见了友人，去世前一天还和朋友联系，大家对他离世的消息感到无比震惊。
 据称，张代兵自幼喜欢数学，95年以优秀的成绩考入国防科技大学。在校发明了电磁飞轮储能装置，以及无线充电装置，车载半导体制冷冰箱等等，受到奖励。之后专注导航以及制导专业上，在国防科技大获得博士学位后留校工作。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 4 (Released), Shantou, Guangdong. It was revealed online that Secretary Wu Peifeng of Xili Town had promised to solve the housing land problem of Lin Huiping, a villager suffering from leukemia in the jurisdiction before October 20, 2024.
However, it is now 2025, and the problem of Lin Huiping's housing land has not been solved, and Secretary Wu Peifeng cannot be contacted now.
According to the whistleblower, villager Lin Huiping once knelt in front of the municipal government and begged for a solution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 4 (Released) Changsha, Hunan. The property management company of Mingfa International City Phase I, in cooperation with the developer, charged parking fees to the owners of the community without legal property rights and approval from government departments, which angered all the owners of the community. Many complaints and calls to the police fell on deaf ears. Many rights-defending owners have been detained, and one of them was labeled as "involved in organized crime."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 3, someone posted a couplet on the signboard downstairs of the Shanghai Stock Exchange: "Ten thousand people are locked up to welcome the New Year, thousands of stocks hit the limit to bid farewell to the old year" and "Close down for the good luck"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 3, a fire broke out at the Yanjing Brewery in Qufu, Jining, Shandong, spreading to the dormitory building of Qufu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine next door. Flames could be seen rising from the balcony of the student dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the couple whose homestead was robbed in Xilu Town, Shantou City, Guangdong Province, are suffering from leukemia and colon cancer and have not much time left. The couple should be isolated to prevent infection in such a serious condition, but now the whole family can only squeeze into a 40-square-meter hut. The husband who suffers from leukemia has to kneel down in front of the city government many times to ask for help. Secretary Wu Peifeng of the town government once promised to solve their homestead problem on December 20, 24, but he has not been contacted until now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, an old mother in Shenbei New District, Shenyang sent a video asking for help. Her daughter was arrested and prosecuted for petitioning and reporting the local public prosecutor's inaction. The court will be held in the Shenbei New District Court at 9.30 on January 7. The mother is worried about internal collusion in Shenbei District, and hopes that netizens will go and witness it, and help them apply for jurisdiction objections to be transferred to other courts.
The last time the Shenbei Court held a hearing, her daughter was tied up all over her body for trial. She filed multiple lawsuits and then withdrew the lawsuit to extend her detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that the signals of Hong Kong Jade Channel and Pearl Channel broadcast in Guangdong were censored by special supply. The netizen compared the TV synchronization images of the two places and found that the signals of Guangdong were often replaced with advertisements or non-station logo version of popular songs when playing relatively sensitive content such as program previews, BBC or Basic Law. No longer fully synchronized broadcasting like before, netizens are very afraid that the next step will be to "customize" programs for Guangdong: "I hope we won't even have the Olympics to watch in the future" P1- 01:52 Guangdong Cable cut back after the interruption, and it can be seen that the content is still different from the original version 02:49 Guangdong's special version arranged two "Live Spirit Contact" trailers to pull time to match the original version on the left 05:56 Janice's advertisement was replaced with a Greater Bay Area promotional advertisement 06:06 Guangdong's special version missed 0.5 seconds of Janice's advertisement. It can be concluded that the basis of the special version is still the original version, similar to the previous Macau version, "insert yourself...
fullContent:
近日 有网友发现香港翡翠台和明珠台在广东播出的信号被特供审查
该网友对比两地TV同步画面发现，广东的信号经常在播放到节目预告、BBC或者基本法等相对敏感内容时被替换成广告或是无台标版劲歌。不再像以前完全同步广播，网友很害怕下一步会开始给广东“定制”节目：“希望以后别连奥运都没得给我们看”
P1- 
01:52 广东有线插播完切回，可以看出内容跟原版依然不一样
02:49 广东特供版排了两次《直播灵接触》预告来拉时间，以对上左边原版同步播出
05:56 珍妮丝广告被替换为大湾区宣传广告 
06:06 广东特供版漏了0.5秒珍妮丝广告，可以断定特供版的基础仍是原版，类似于以前澳门版的操作，“自己插播自己” P2- 
01:37 广东版切回香港广告，可以看出内容不相同 
04:52 原版率先播出ident 
05:05 广东版播出ident，可以看出广东版直接忽略了PG家长指引，以拉近两版的时间 
05:16 两版同步播出 
P3-广东版特供了一个无台标的《劲歌》给你

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 31, many students from Yicheng Experimental Primary School in Lincang, Yunnan Province, vomited and had abdominal pain and went to the hospital for treatment. 121 primary school students were infected with Norovirus (a fecal-oral virus that can cause gastrointestinal reactions such as nausea and diarrhea, and can lead to severe dehydration or even death).
The official report stated that the school's rice, milk, apples, eggs, etc. were all qualified.
A reporter called the school to inquire about the situation, and the school responded: Don't worry about it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Insufficient heating, the property management played word games, secretly changed the temperature measurement results and asked the owner to sign
January 2, Shanxi Taiyuan Xiwenzhuang Yangguangli Community, the owner's home was insufficiently heated, the property management came to measure the temperature at 12.5 degrees, and when the temperature measurement results were signed and confirmed, they found that they had been changed to 18.5 degrees. Faced with the owner's doubts, the property management denied it and asked: "Who changed it?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens submitted a post suspected to be Squid Game 2, which was banned. Not much content can be found on Douyin. Even if sorted by time, the content that can be searched is from several years ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 1 Shanghai High Court shared a case: Unauthorized "unlocking" of new energy vehicle batteries constitutes a crime of damaging computer information systems

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Suzhou government issued the "5.0 List of "Exemptions from Penalties or Light Penalties" for Minor Illegal Acts Involving Enterprises", which reduces and exempts penalties for some unreasonable or minor violations of laws.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, a shop in Chaozhou, Guangdong, encountered a man kneeling down to sell "copper coin strings"
After searching, it was found that kneeling down to sell goods is not an isolated case, and has been going on for several years across the country

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 4, a lawyer said that offshore fishing is more terrible than deep-sea fishing. For example, some companies signed a contract with the government to invest in the local area, but suddenly the government wants to break the contract and terminate the contract in advance. In order not to bear the liability for breach of contract, the government will send people to inspect your company every now and then. As long as the problem is found, the debt can be converted into a criminal debt, and a fortune can be made. Even if the government terminates the contract in advance, it will be very difficult for the company to defend its rights and sue on the government's territory later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Yinchuan, Ningxia, was hit by a 4.8-magnitude earthquake, and more than 56 small earthquakes occurred frequently in one day. People in Yinchuan were worried that this was a precursor to a larger earthquake, and began to flee Yinchuan. In the past few days, Yinchuan was congested out of the city, gas stations had long queues, and the train station was crowded with people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Dongguan, Guangdong, a netizen named "Courageous North" found a man taking photos of women's skirts several times in a shopping mall. When he tried to stop him, he was beaten by the man and hospitalized.
Currently, "Courageous North" is still receiving treatment at the Dongguan People's Hospital, and is unable to afford the medical expenses because he cannot work, while the man who took the photos and beat him was only detained for five days.
As of the time of posting, the video in which "Courageous North" said that the man who beat him was only detained for five days has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a blogger wrote that the public intellectuals should be more careful. Without a powerful sixth-generation fighter, the country will not feel safe. If the national defense is not strong, we can only go to the United States to work. Only when the country is strong can we have a stable life.
Netizens said in the comment area: What does the sixth-generation aircraft have to do with me? "Can the sixth-generation aircraft ensure that the people will not go hungry?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 4, Changchun, Jilin. It was revealed online that Volkswagen Excellence Holding Group Co., Ltd. could not pay its employees’ wages, so it printed consumer vouchers to offset workers’ wages. However, the consumer vouchers can only be used in cooperating merchants, and no change is given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Du Mei, a female doctoral student at Tongji University in Shanghai, died of intestinal cancer at the age of 30.
She said in her autobiography that she was officially diagnosed with duodenal malignant tumor in March last year and was originally expected to get her doctorate in June this year. "I hate that I can't afford the high hotel accommodation fees to meet the hospital's examination requirements, and I also hate that I don't have the connections to find someone to learn how to get admitted quickly." "Even if I die, I want to be as brilliant and dazzling as a flower."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 4, a netizen said that he met a tourist holding a veterans card at work in Hong Kong Disneyland and asked if he could enjoy preferential treatment with the card. When he was told that there was no preferential treatment, the tourist questioned: "Holding the card can enjoy preferential treatment at tourist attractions across the country, why not Hong Kong Disneyland? Hong Kong is part of China, don't think that Hong Kong is British territory." The netizen said that Hong Kong Disneyland does not give preferential treatment to veterans from anywhere, and it is not targeting Chinese soldiers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 3, a villager in Yanqu County, Shanxi reported that there were more than 20 cameras densely hung on the signal poles beside the road, and the surrounding area was relatively desolate.
The local traffic police responded: This is normal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the EU officially approved the EU Forced Labor Regulation, which explicitly prohibits the sale, import and export of goods made with forced labor in the EU market, covering all industries and products at all stages of the supply chain.
In response, netizens hope that the EU will publish reporting channels, and some netizens said that it turns out that it is Western capitalists who care about our labor rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 4, Changchun, Jilin. A netizen said that she bought a camera with a national subsidy at a DJI authorized store and shared it on Xiaohongshu. Then she received a call from the seller, who said that other parties did not receive national subsidies and asked her to delete the post.
Netizens questioned how the store found her through the platform since she never mentioned the store information in the post, and believed that DJI violated personal privacy and freedom.
Some netizens in the comment area also accused her of posting it while enjoying the subsidy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media reported that the minimum standard of basic pension for urban and rural residents in Sichuan Province has been raised from 153 yuan to 163 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Domestic netizens are discussing Xi Jinping implicitly:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"I only bully Chinese people!" Zhai Yunyao, a bully who kidnapped, beat, and burned her compatriots with cigarette butts, was sentenced to 13 years in prison. It is said that only 8 years have passed, and she has been released and sent back to China! 
In 2015, Zhai Yunyao and her small group bullied a girl named Liu Yiran in a cold drink shop and asked her to kneel down for 20 minutes. Then they dragged Liu Yiran to a nearby park and tortured her for 5 hours, and threatened her not to call the police. (The abuse included stripping her clothes, burning her vagina with cigarette butts, forcing her to eat sand, forcing them to eat shaved hair, etc., all kinds of behaviors are simply outrageous.) 
It is reported that the conflict between Zhai Yunyao and Liu Yiran began with jealousy between men and women. Zhai Yunyao was dating Liu Yiran's ex-boyfriend at the time, and things started from here. At first, it was a dispute on the Internet, and then it evolved into Zhai Yunyao's offline bullying of Liu Yiran. 
Afterwards, Liu Yiran recalled in court: She said...
fullContent:
“我只欺负中国人！”绑架、殴打、用烟头烫同胞的留美霸凌者翟云瑶，被判刑13年，据传如今仅过去8年，竟刑满释放，被遣送回国了！
 2015年，翟云瑶伙和她的小团体，在一家冷饮店对一名叫刘怡然的女生进行霸凌，并要其求下跪长达20分钟。随后又把刘怡然拉至附近公园进行虐待折磨，时间长达5小时，并威胁她不准报警。（虐待的内容包括扒光衣服、用烟头烫伤x部、强迫其吃沙子、逼他们吃被剃掉的头发等，种种行为简直令人发指。）
 据悉，翟云瑶和刘怡然的矛盾始于男女之间的争风吃醋，翟云瑶当时正和刘怡然的前男友交往，事情也从这里开始，起初是网络上的争执，而后演变成翟云瑶对刘怡然的线下霸凌。
 事后刘怡然在庭上回忆：她说如果不是翟云瑶等人打累了，或许她真的有可能死在加州这片土地上。
 翟云瑶被捕后在庭审上，还口出狂言：“能快点判吗？我下月生日还要过呢。”“我又没欺负美国人，我只欺负中国人！”并觉得能够和国内一样，被父母很快捞出来。直到得知自己的保释金高达300万美金时才意识到事请的严重性。
 而随着调查深入，警方发现翟云瑶并不是第一次残忍霸凌他人，多名中国女孩站出来指证曾遭翟云瑶霸凌，有人玩游戏胜利了被翟云瑶打到鼻血直流；有人路过时看她一眼便遭到群殴。
 最终，法院判处翟云瑶13年监禁，判决结果宣布的那一刻，翟云瑶终于崩溃了。她哭喊着求饶，说自己知道错了，再也不敢了，但这一切都太晚了。
 据媒体报道，翟云瑶从小被爷爷奶奶宠的无法无天，在幼儿园时就霸凌同学，老人非但没有批评，反而指责院校看管不周。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2 last year, Han Wenxiu, deputy director of the Central Financial and Economic Affairs Office, said: my country's domestic demand potential is huge and it is a rich mine.
Han Wenxiu recently said: China's GDP is expected to grow by about 5% in 2024, and its contribution to global economic growth is close to 30%
Netizens said: A year has passed quickly, and the mining of the rich mine has yielded results.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 5 (Released) The elderly couple Cai Guangli, depositors of Henan Rural Commercial Bank, have been unable to withdraw their life savings from their bank cards since April 2022. It has been three years now. Due to lack of living expenses, their lives are unsustainable, and the couple can only survive by picking up scraps.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, the People's Daily published an article: US-China trade is very important to the development and prosperity of the United States.
Netizens said: "Then stop the trade as soon as possible and don't let the United States prosper"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 5, a large number of people gathered at the entrance of Pucheng Vocational School to seek justice for the student who fell from the building. It seemed that someone was arrested at the scene, and the people shouted "Release him! Release him!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Peking University professor Chen Ping said that the 1.6 billion yuan has fattened up the party that hates the country, so I suggest that the government should provide a large fund so that the self-motivated patriots can also eat patriotic food and win the cognitive war. Otherwise, if the self-motivated patriots bring their own food, how can they possibly win the cognitive war launched by the United States?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on January 5, Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan Mo-po said that Hong Kong's fiscal deficit has exceeded 100 billion for two consecutive years. Taking into account the current economic and financial situation, the Hong Kong government is considering increasing efforts to cut departmental resources and control the growth rate of expenditure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, a Chinese soldier named “Flat-headed Brother Hongming” who went to Russia to join the army posted a video saying that he had just received an order from the company commander that their team of four was going to attack a basement.
He also advised Chinese people not to join the army in Russia and said that if he survived, he would report to everyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, the magazine Qiushi published an important article by Xi Jinping, in which the word "struggle" was mentioned many times.
The article pointed out that a great struggle must be carried out to promote Chinese-style modernization. History has repeatedly proved that if you seek security through struggle, security will survive, but if you seek security through weakness and concession, security will die; if you seek development through struggle, development will flourish, but if you seek development through weakness and concession, development will decline. We must maintain strategic clarity and be aware of various risks and challenges. We must maintain strategic confidence and strengthen our struggle. We must maintain strategic initiative and enhance our struggle skills.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, the family members of the child who fell from the building were kept in a hotel by school teachers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Weinan, Shaanxi, a student from Pucheng Vocational School fell from a building, and his family was held in a hotel by the teacher.
On January 5, the family knelt down at the school holding the child's portrait to defend their rights. A large number of people came to support the family. Some netizens live-broadcasted the scene, and then the live broadcast room was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Indignant citizens gathered in front of Pucheng Vocational School to demand justice for the students who fell from the building and their families. The public security department deployed a large number of police forces to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
People gathered at Pucheng Vocational School to speak out for the child who fell from the building and his family. During the gathering, some people were taken away by the police with their throats choked.
An insider also said that "the principal has already climbed over the wall and fled."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 2, Hubei. A blind person recorded the process of going out to buy a birthday cake from a first-person perspective.
She walked on her own blind path, but kept saying sorry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 3, Shanghai. The man said that the birth of a new political party in China is the civilization progress that the people want to see most. January 3, Jiangsu. The man said that he could not believe even a single punctuation mark in what they said. How could he trust a group that treated him like a pig or a dog and believe that they would treat him well?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Late at night, there were still people gathered at the school gate and were unwilling to leave. Netizens flooded the live broadcast room with messages like: "Long live the people!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 4, Huaibei, Anhui. A man knelt down and held a sign, calling on the country to ban online ride-hailing services and return jobs to taxi drivers. The man said, "Online ride-hailing services are platforms dominated by Japanese and American capital, and they are harming Chinese people."
